credit_line: Gift of Orson L. St. John, Class of 1928 in memory of Charles Francis Gaskill, Class of 1928, Talcott Miner Banks, Class of 1928, Gordon Bailey Washburn, Class of 1928, John W.G. Tenney, Class of 1928 and Bronson Fargo, Class of 1951
title: Bijin-ga, Beauties-part of the tryptych
inscriptions: Unidentified publisher's seal in lower right; Censor seal: seals of Muramatsu Genroku (at left) and Yoshimura Gentaro (at right) in lower right, used 1847-48
